author: jstrachan
msg: Patched the manager construction code to make it a little cleaner

author: jstrachan
msg: Modified Messenger API to use Destination rather than a String subject to allow cleaner JMS integration, particularly when sending a reply to a JMS message

author: jstrachan
msg: Made SessionFactory take an optional Properties object which makes it easy for derived SessionFactories to work with things like JNDI and so on.

author: jstrachan
msg: Tidied build process to make website and javadoc neater

author: jstrachan
msg: removed documentation which has moved over to the jakarta-commons/xdocs directory
